document_data.caption: A map showing the Huhrong's Citadel in Immilmar.
document_data.name: Huhrong's Citadel
document_data.mainbody: The '''Huhrong's Citadel''', which was also called the '''Iron Lord's castle''', was a fortress and seat of government in the capital city of [[Immilmar]] in [[Rashemen]] in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The keep stood above Immilmar at the city's center.
document_data.Description: This foreboding castle was made from stone and [[iron]]. Powerful water and earth spirits were believed to have played a part in its construction.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Huhrong's Citadel was the ancestral home of Rashemen's Iron Lord, or [[Huhrong]], who, in 1367 DR, was [[Yvarrg Bearkiller]]. In addition to the Iron Lord's family, his trusted advisors and commanders also inhabited the citadel. A trio of [[hathran]] [[wychlaran]] were also found within.
